Comments_List: I learned basic Air Force knowledge and how ROTC fits into the bigger picture of the Air Force.
I learned about the background, purpose, and parts of the Air Force. I learned teamwork as well as skills I can use in the future as an Air Force Officer.
Learned the basic foundations of the Air Force and inisghts into what it takes to be an Air Force officer
I really enjoyed how informative the class was. I learned new things about the Air Force and was able to cooperate with fellow classmates to learn the material.
I had no problems with the course. The material was well taught.
Yes, I would definitely recommend this course to another student because it is very informative and is engaging. I liked learning about the background and the main components of the Air Force.
I would reccommend this course of the you intentd to do AFROTC
